timeline.bodyText: just a thought, could we use lombok here?
timeline.author: rpvilao

replies.bodyText: We could definitely use it here, but it wasn't already imported the module and I wanted to keep the example code as much aligned to the article as possible.
replies.author: michael-pratt

timeline.bodyText: As per guidelines, the opening brace should be at the end of line 13, not by itself.
timeline.author: KevinGilmore
